title: Discussion-Based Nutrition Education Design: Critical Thinking Enhancement for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutrition theory and knowledge of diet-related diseases
context.additional_context: Discussion-based learning conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment where students select topics, gather argumentative materials, and instructors provide facilitation, supervision, and feedback

learning_goals: Learners can construct a clear position on controversial nutrition topics based on scientifically validated evidence.
Learners can critically analyze peers' arguments during discussions and present logical rebuttals.
Learners can systematically present practical proposals for solving community nutrition issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
